name: Bounda Forever
description:
A lovely style of painting rogue-like games. In the game you face a tide of enemies, defeat them, and survive. The game offers many weapons to help you win. No long story, no ending, any time you can be reckless to a game. Developers will continue to update and continue to bring you new experiences.
Characters are moved through the W, A, S, and D keys on the keyboard. Aim and shoot with the mouse. Space bar release skill. Gamepad are also supported.
